Name: Defence to death
About the game: Defence to death - game in genre 'Tower Defence' . Defend Your castle from monster! Show Your's strength and wisdom. - Build, upgrade and sell towers. - Earn money in the mine (click on mine) - Destroy enemies by clicking them! - Buy upgrades for towers in the shop. Without it you'll not able to upgrade tower.
